sourcesContent:
<template>
    <body>
    </body>
</template>

<script>
import * as d3 from 'd3';
export default {

}

var margin = {top: 8, right: 10, bottom: 2, left: 10},
    width = 300 - margin.left - margin.right,
    height = 150 - margin.top - margin.bottom;

var parseDate = d3.time.format("%b %Y").parse;

var x = d3.time.scale()
    .range([0, width]);

var y = d3.scale.linear()
    .range([height, 0]);

var area = d3.svg.area()
    .x(function(d) { return x(d.date); })
    .y0(height)
    .y1(function(d) { return y(d.price); });

var line = d3.svg.line()
    .x(function(d) { return x(d.date); })
    .y(function(d) { return y(d.price); });


d3.tsv("stocks.tsv", type, function(error, data) {
  var symbols = d3.nest()
      .key(function(d) { return d.symbol; })
      .entries(data);

  x.domain([
    d3.min(symbols, function(symbol) { return symbol.values[0].date; }),
    d3.max(symbols, function(symbol) { return symbol.values[symbol.values.length - 1].date; })
  ]);

  var svg = d3.select("body").selectAll("svg")
      .data(symbols)
    .enter().append("svg")
      .attr("width", width + margin.left + margin.right)
      .attr("height", height + margin.top + margin.bottom)
    .append("g")
      .attr("transform", "translate(" + margin.left + "," + margin.top + ")")
      .each(multiple)
    .on("mouseover", flipModeText)
    .on("mouseout", flipModeTextSquad);

  svg.append("text")
      .attr("x", width - 6)
      .attr("y", height - 6)
      .style("text-anchor", "end")
      .text(function(d) { return d.key; });
});

function multiple(symbol) {
  var svg = d3.select(this);

  y.domain([0, d3.max(symbol.values, function(d) { return d.price; })]);

  svg.append("path")
      .attr("class", "area")
      .attr("d", area(symbol.values))
    .on("mouseover", flipMode)
    .on("mouseout", flipModeSquad);

  svg.append("path")
      .attr("class", "line")
      .attr("d", line(symbol.values));
}

function type(d) {
  d.price = +d.price;
  d.date = parseDate(d.date);
  return d;
}


function flipMode() {
    d3.select(this)
    .transition()
    .ease("elastic")
    .duration(1000)
    .style("fill", "black");
  }

function flipModeSquad() {
    d3.select(this)
    .transition()
    .delay(500)
    .duration(5000)
    .style("fill", "#e7e7e7");

  }
function flipModeText() {
    d3.select(this)
    .transition()
    .ease("elastic")
    .duration(1000)
    .select("text")
      .attr("y", height- 12)
      .text("Mo Money Mo Problems")
    .style("fill", "white");
  }

function flipModeTextSquad() {
    d3.select(this)
    .transition()
    .delay(1000)
    .duration(5000)
    .ease("elastic")
    .select("text")
      .attr("y", height - 6)
      .text(function(d) { return d.key; })
    .style("fill", "#black");

  }

</script>
